https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/p2lVAcPuRPSO8Al6hDDGw0OgMi8.jpg Dangal is an extraordinary true story based on the life of Mahavir Singh and his two daughters, Geeta and Babita Phogat. The film traces the inspirational journey of a father who trains his daughters to become world class wrestlers. Dangal
